Welcome!
I am a Assistant Professor (tenure track) at the Department of Economics and Finance, LUISS Guido Carli in Rome, and a research affiliate at CEPR.
My research interests include management, entrepreneurship, machine learning and open source big data techniques.
I received my Ph.D. in Economics from Stanford University in 2017.
